movie.title: All Eyez on Me
movie.plot: All Eyez on Me chronicles the life and legacy of Tupac Shakur, including his rise to superstardom as a hip-hop artist, actor, poet and activist, as well as his imprisonment and prolific, controversial time at Death Row Records. Against insurmountable odds, Tupac rose to become a cultural icon whose career and persona both continue to grow long after his passing.

events.title: Tupac Shakur is shot five times and hospitalised
Tupac is gunned down in a drive-by shooting
